mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CBT0005D ( TXN_ID, STATISTICS_PROCESSED, STATISTICS_SENT, STATISTICS_DELIVERED, STATISTICS_SEEN, STATISTICS_CLICKED, STATISTICS_VIEWED, STATISTICS_RESPONDED, RESPONSE, CRT_USER_ID, CRT_DT, UPD_USER_ID, UPD_DT ) VALUES ( #{txnId}, #{statisticsProcessed}, #{statisticsSent}, #{statisticsDelivered}, #{statisticsSeen}, #{statisticsClicked}, #{statisticsViewed}, #{statisticsResponded}, #{response}, 349, SYSDATE, 349, SYSDATE )
